titleStmt.title: Parasitaster, or The favvne as it hath been diuers times presented at the blacke Friars, by the Children of the Queenes Maiesties Reuels, and since at Powles. VVritten by Iohn Marston.
titleStmt.author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.

editionStmt.edition: And now corrected of many faults, which by reason of the authors absence, were let slip in the first edition.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] P[urfoot] for VV. C[otton],

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Partly from the same setting as STC 17483.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
